question: Which of the following versions of fast chess that was in news recently, when Koneru Humpy won the World Womenâ€™s Rapid Chess Championship had more time on the clock for the White than the Black?
explanation: In Armageddon chess, the White is given more time on the clock than the Black. This is a way to produce decisive results- acting as a tie-breaker. Koneru Humpy became the 2<sup>nd</sup> Indian chess player after Vishwanathan Anand to win the Rapid Gold.
